= ProvBench Traces =

These provenance traces were collected from three applications (Apache, BLAST, PostMark) each run on
three operating systems (Linux, Mac OS X, and Windows). The tool(s) used to generate these traces included SPADE with H2 SQL storage.

The provenance traces are provided in compressed SQL script format which can be imported in most SQL databases.
